short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Bible verses to help with addiction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Random Bible Verse for Addiction provides strength and encouragement to those dealing with addiction through the power of the Bible. This Chrome extension displays a random Bible verse every 30 minutes that specifically deals with addiction, offering hope and inspiration to those in need. The extension also includes a list of resources for getting help with addiction. Whether you are struggling with addiction yourself or know someone who is, Random Bible Verse for Addiction is a powerful tool for finding comfort and support in your faith.
